title: What name of this font

comments.content: many that look similar, like Akzidenz Grotesk Condensed, Futura Condensed. I think [Heroic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526010126/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typetrust/heroic_condensed_medium/) looks pretty good.
